metadata.title: CVE-2019-14697 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
musl libc through 1.1.23 has an x87 floating-point stack adjustmentimbalance, related to the math/i386/ directory. In some cases, use of thislibrary could introduce out-of-bounds writes that are not present in anapplication's source code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

musl - 1.1.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
musl-tools - 1.1.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: musl package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm3').
